headline: Jim Cramer on EMCOR: “A Company That’s Perfectly on Theme for the Current Moment”
summary: EMCOR Group, Inc. (NYSE:EME) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer talked about. During the episode, Cramer called it a “very good stock,” as he remarked: “What I’ll tell you is that when I looked at EMCOR’s business, I saw a company that’s perfectly on theme for the current moment.
